# Contributing

**The issue tracker is only for bug reports and enhancement suggestions. If you have a question, please ask it in the [Pine Script Syntax Highlighter Server](https://discord.gg/jJpT8h2) instead of opening an issue â€“ you will get redirected there anyway.**

If you wish to contribute to the Pine Script Syntax Highlighter codebase or documentation, feel free to fork the repository and submit a
pull request.

## Setup

To get ready to work on the codebase, please do the following:

1.  Fork & clone the repository, and make sure you're on the **master** branch
2.  Code your heart out!
3.  [Submit a pull request](https://github.com/kendinikertenkelebek/pine-script-syntax-highlighter/compare)
